website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-maneuver machine that works great on wood floors and low-pile carpets.
pros: Swivel steering makes it easy to maneuver
cons: No carpet height adjustment option or hose

customer_reviews.title: Easy lightweight vacuum that cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum, suction is great for my little furry pet Yorkie. Or even a larg dog. Handles smoothly, easy to use. Not to noisy it is noisy like any other vacuum. Seems to deep clean carpet. Great Vaccum!
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vacuum, its light weight and the suction is awesome, even on the tile and hard wood. Evert other one I have had would spit the dirt ect out of the back, this vacuum is awesome, so pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: No manual, warrenty card, receipt, or anything
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received my vacuum as it did not have any instruction manual or any other information pertaining to my product. I have no idea what size belt it takes or bags for that matter. I have no warranty card to return in case there is a problem, and I was suppose to receive one free cleaning from an Oreck Store with my purchase. Did not receive that or any information about that offer. Not sure I will purchase another item like this off of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gunkel

customer_reviews.title: Oreck is still the best!
customer_reviews.text: This model is really easy to assemble, no tools needed! Beautiful color and most of all it simply works like an Oreck, smooth, powerful, yet lightweight! Great on her surfaces too! I expect this one to last a longtime as my previous one did.
customer_reviews.author: Viking 69

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: Was too powerful for our shaggy carpet. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, compact vacuum that does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Oreck before this one. This model has a light in front, down by the floor, which I like, but unlike my previous Oreck, it doesn't fit under dressers, sofa, low tables, etc., which seems like a big oversight. So, only 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Oreck-we’re still using the first in the garage. Best vacuum cleaner I ever bought. I do not care for the canister type as they have a terrible odor no amount of cleaning can get rid of. The bag vacuum is the only way I’ll go, and the Oreck brand is well worth the money. I received this package very quickly, which made it all the better
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Mom, she's had an Oreck vacuum fo almost 30 years. She likes this one more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Buonomo

customer_reviews.title: This is a must
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this little beauty! It is very lightweight which makes is so easy for me, who has shoulder problems. It is compact, very manouveraable, the forward light makes it easy to see the path. The suction is great, and the best feature for me is the replacable bag - for so long I have had bagless cleaners and tipping out the full cups was a nuisence. But with the bags there is no dirt scattering around and replacing them is so very easy. In all, kudos Oreck this is an outstanding cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.author: dust jacket

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, light weight and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum we have owned in 40 years, everything else falls apart after a couple of years. We use this vacuum daily up and down stairs and being so light weight makes the job easy. I would not buy another vacuum, since this one will last over a decade just like my last Oreck.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M

customer_reviews.title: Single speed
customer_reviews.text: Single speed an does not lay flat due to bag design - not as good as our previous oreck
customer_reviews.author: Doghouse

customer_reviews.title: Having it work right and I do love have it work right.
customer_reviews.text: Its still new but realized it don't have an extra belt and I realized the beater bar don't set right. Can I please extange it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight, easy to store vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I've loved Oreck vacuums for years. This one is lightweight, has a bright led light on the front, and a decent size cord. I can vacuum several rooms with it. It is super lightweight and easy to move. I also like how it is compact in size. I was able to squeeze it in a closet I never thought a vacuum would fit in. Highly recommend. Excellent filtration too!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bird

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Oreck vacuum. This model is much better than their previous lightweight models. It has side brushes to brush along baseboards to get those little edge crumbs and things. The cord is long enough to vacuum my full loving room without needing to switch outlets. You can easily vacuum under a table or bed. I love the bag design of Oreck vacuums. They filter allergens so much better than bagless models. And it may sound scary, but the bag is so easy to use and easy to replace. An added bonus of this vacuum is that it is American made. I highly recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Like pushing a brick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum from an Oreck dealer to replace an Oreck XL I had for a long time and loved. (It finally gave out.) This model has nice features but is almost impossible for me to use on carpet. It's so hard to push that it exhausts me, and I have to bend over so far that my back hurts. My carpet isn't anything unusual. I also have an Oreck Gold, which is a dream, but Oreck missed the mark with this one. I don't recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: CebieB

customer_reviews.title: Love love it...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is lightweight and it cleaned my carpet wonderfully. I really love this vacuum. I highly recommend this item if you are loving for a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: LOVE2READ2Nat

product_meta.title: Oreck Elevate Control Bagged Upright Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight, 30ft Power Cord, UK30100, Black, 30 ft
product_meta.description: Style Name:1 Speed| Size:30 ft CordThe Oreck elevate control delivers powerful, allergen-trapping performance for your carpeted floors. Its select filtration technology captures 99percent of allergens, dust and debris at 5. 0 microns or greater. The Sani seal system automatically seals filtration contents upon disposal to lock in dirt & debris, while the extra-large Capacity holds up to 4x the amount of dust, dirt and debris of a typical bag less vacuum. At half the weight of vacuums in its class, the elevate control delivers a complete clean for your carpets without the strain of lifting traditional heavy uprights. The full access low-profile design with an extended 30 foot cord enables you to get those hard to reach areas under furniture, while the 5 bright led headlights let you finally see what you've been missing. The elevate control has a 1 year , which includes 1 free service tune-up at your local Oreck dealer or authorized Oreck service centre, to ensure ongoing optimal performance. Take control of your clean with Oreck. The elevate control is proudly made in the USA of U. S. & globally-sourced components. Thanks for supporting USA Jobs with your Oreck purchase. To ensure optimal filtration & cleaning performance, only Oreck certified filtration bags beginning with the letters "AK" should be used with the Oreck elevate control. Damage to the product caused by the installation or use of non-Oreck certified filtration bags or components shall not be covered under and is excluded from this .
feature_bullets: 4X MORE CAPACITY: This bagged upright holds up to 4x more than a typical bag less vacuum cleaner
ALLERGEN-TRAPPING: Powerful SELECT filtration technology captures 99% of allergens
LIGHTWEIGHT: Weighing only 9 pounds, the Oreck Elevate Control vacuum is so light it is half the weight of most vacuums in its class
FULL REACH: The low-profile, sleek design includes 5 LED headlights and a 30 foot long power cord, providing full visibility and reach in hard-to-access places
EASY BAG DISPOSAL: SaniSeal technology automatically helps to lock in dirt during disposal of vacuum bags
